title: EV subsidies no longer needed, says Transport minister Nitin Gadkari
description: Road transport and highway minister Nitin Gadkari announced that subsidies for electric vehicle makers are no longer necessary as production costs have decreased. He highlighted the lower GST rate on electric vehicles compared to petrol and diesel vehicles, emphasizing that consumers are now choosing EVs and CNG vehicles independently.
